Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transit rides. 

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use dockless scooters, bikes, ride-sharing like Uber or Lyft, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Enter Moovit! Moovit provides riders with a one-stop-shop journey experience to help them get from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and real-time arrival information with ease so that you can plan your trip with confidence. Pay and validate your rides. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike, scooter or a combination of them. 

Moovit guides more than 930 million users in over 3400 cities throughout the world. Commuters will find updated bus and train times, transit maps, and, where available, real-time line arrivals. Locate nearby bus stops and train stations, travel with on-the-go live navigation guidance, receive get-off alerts when approaching your destination to ensure a smooth ride. That's why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year in 2017 by the App Store.

Moovit is your personal assistant for all your transit rides! 

► Real-time arrivals. View real-time arrival information, which is taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains. Avoid wasting time guessing train times or bus times.

► Digital payment. Purchase bus & train tickets and validate your digital pass with a tap (select cities). 

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction, and more so that you can plan ahead if your bus time or train time changed.

Atlas Navi is a Drive to Earn A.I. navigation app that uses live video from your smartphone camera to analyze the road in front of you and automatically detect: 
- traffic in each lane (counting how many vehicles are in each lane in front of you) 
- road construction / road work signs 
- road closures 
- accident detection 
- police vehicles (some countries only) 
- potholes 
- available / free parking space

The app uses advanced computer vision (A.I.) algorithms to analyze the video feeds from your smartphone camera and detect all the above problems on the road. It does this in the background, without interfering with the navigation instructions. 

Atlas Navi analyses the road 25 times per second when used with the camera from your smartphone. It generates 100 times better data than other navigation systems, which helps reroute other drivers to avoid potential traffic congestion and dangerous situations. 
Based on these A.I. detections, the app reroutes other drivers on quicker, safer, and less congested routes. 

Atlas Navi only uploads to the server the relevant information for traffic optimization: the type of detections and the GPS co-ordinates of said problem. No images or videos are uploaded unless specifically enabled by the user. If enabled, it can store your road trip recorded videos in the cloud, but the default option is to keep them on your device. 
Atlas Navi rewards drivers who send traffic data with a small amount of $NAVI for each mile they drive if they have a 3D vehicle selected in the app and provide traffic data from their cameras.

You can of course use Atlas Navi as a standard navigation app, without turning on the smartphone camera or the A.I. detections. You will benefit from all the rerouting and information received from other drivers which will make your route safer and faster. 

Current features include: 
- Navigation module with very accurate address search function 
- Video recording of your road trips, stored in the cloud or on the device 
- Trip history with associated videos (if any) 
- A.I. camera view - see what the camera is detecting in real time around you. 
- Livestream your road trip by sharing a simple link (the others don't need to download Atlas Navi) 
- Car garage where you can select from 3D vehicles in your garage. Customize, change their color, and choose which one you want to drive with today. 
- Rewards system - get rewarded in $NAVI if others join your Driving Club 
- Driving Club - see the others who have joined your personal club 
- Wallet - rewards earned and spent

Atlas Navi is adding more features on a bi-weekly basis and will keep you updated with the latest innovation in avoiding traffic using A.I.

In Iasi si Oradea aplicatia foloseste date reale de la regionala de transport. 
Aceasta aplicatie iti permite sa vezi mijloacele de transport in comun puse pe harta de ceilalti calatori. Pentru o buna functionare trebuie facuta o promovare masiva in fiecare oras, momentan suntem in procesul de promovare in Iasi, urmand Bucuresti si apoi celelalte orase, deci la incepul este de asteptat sa vedeti putine autobuze. Asteptati promovarea in orasul dumneavoastra inainte sa aveti asteptarea sa fie multe autobuze pe harta.

Instalati aplicatia pentru a vedea pe harta in timp real mijloacele de transport in comun din Iasi (si din celelalte mari orase alea tarii: Alba, Arad, Brasov, Bucuresti, Cluj, Constanta, Craiova, Iasi, Oradea, Ploiesti, Sibiu, Timisoara, in curand si Bacau).

Principiul de functionare se baseaza pe inputul comunitatii de calatori, fiecare utilizator avand sansa de a vedea informatiile despre mijloacele de transport in comun, dar in acelasi timp este sarcina noastra a tuturor sa sharuim informatiile despre mijloacele de transport cu care calatorim. In acest mod, aplicatia nu depinde de nici un fel de hardware special (GPS-uri pe autobuze sau servere ale regiilor de transport in comun etc), folosind intr-un mod util ceea ce cu totii avem in ziua de astazi (smartphone-ul).


Pentru a folosi aplicatia NU este necesar nici un fel de autentificare, este gratuita, momentan nu are nici reclame care sa deranjeze, singura conditie pentru a folosi aplicatia este sa fim solidari unii cu ceilalti si sa "sharuim" informatii despre locatia autobuzelor.

Din punct de vedere technic, proiectul nostru are in spate platforma Firebase pentru a putea avea functionalitatea de update in timp real a pozitiilor mijloacelor de transport in comun.

Interfata aplicatiei consta intr-o harta a orasului nostru, un cerc de 1km, o componenta de cautare si un buton.
Practic incarcam pe harta doar mijloacele de transport in comun de pe o raza de un 1km fata de locatia mea curenta, desigur daca dorim sa vedem si dincolo de aceasta distanta putem folosi componenta de "Cautare", toate mijloacele de transport in comun selectate prin acea componenta devin vizibile pe harta necontand distanta fata de locatia mea. Putem defini un numar limitat momentan la 2 route "favorite", acestea vor fi vizibile pe harta pe toata suprafata orasului la incarcarea aplicatiei.
Pentru a sharui locatia unui mijloc de transport avem 2 cazuri:
1. Daca autobuzul/tramvaiul cu care intentionez sa plec nu a fost inca sharuit de altcineva ne harta, apas butonul verde -> "Am plecat", apoi din lista afisata selectez ruta dorita si directia de deplasare printr-un slide stanga sau dreapta. 
2. Daca autobuzul a fost deja sharuit, dau click pe el si apas "Am plecat"

Aplicatia face validari si nu permite sharuirea de informatii decat daca userul se afla pe traseul mijlocului de transport respectiv.
Cand sharuim locatia unui mijloc de transport cu optiunea "Am plecat"  aplicatia incepe sa ia recurent locatia userului curent, cu functionalitatea "Am vazut" dau voi aplicatiei sa-mi ia o singura data locatia. 
Odata sharuita locatia unui autobuz userul nu este nevoit neaparat sa stea cu aplicatia pornita, poate inchide ecranul telefonului sau poate comuta catre orice alta aplicatie doreste (desigur cu conditia sa tina in background aplicatia HereItIs).

Aplicatia Necesita urmatoarele drepturi de accces:
- Accessul la locatia curenta (atat cand aplicatia e deschisa cat si cand e in background)

O prezentare a aplicatiei puteti gasi aici: https://storage.googleapis.com/here-it-is/public/Romania/Prezentare_HEREITIS.pdf

OTL Oradea application is a travel platform offered by Oradea Transport Local SA. In the application all the actions necessary to facilitate the use of public transport can be performed. The application allows the purchase of travel tickets using the bank card, the calculation of the optimal route for the passenger and the visualization of lines, stations and means of transport in real time on the map.

After creating an account and associating it with a transport card, the user can recharge the card with travel tickets directly in the application, using online payment by bank card. The user can check the status of the card and the active travel tickets at any given time.

A user can manage several transport cards on a single account and can perform actions of recharging the respective cards, whether it is the recharge of the electronic wallet, the purchase of new subscriptions or the extension of the existing ones.

After performing the various purchase/validation/control actions, the user will have the possibility of viewing a detailed history of transactions.

Users who benefit from subsidies in accordance with the legislation in force will be able to request the approval of a subsidized profile directly from the application by sending supporting documents. Following the approval of such a profile from the application or from the ticket point, users will be able to purchase/request, directly from the application, travel tickets with discount or free of charge.

Legal entities that have a collaboration with the transport administration will be able to manage their card portfolio directly from the web portal or the mobile application.

When purchasing a travel ticket, when it is approaching its expiration date or when other actions are performed on the card, the user can choose to receive push notifications or e-mails.

The application provides the traveler with the means to find the optimal route between the starting point A and the arrival point B, using the locations of the vehicles on the route.

The traveler can start the journey from the current location or from another location on the map and can choose their destination by looking for an address, a point of interest, a desired station or even placing a pin on the map. They can also choose a location they have previously searched for or added to favorites.

The application shows how long it will take to get to the nearest station, when the vehicle will arrive at the station and how long the trip will take.

It gives the traveler the possibility of saving frequently used locations on a designated menu page or when searching for those locations on the main page. Thus, the user can start a much faster and easier route in the future.

The application will display in real time the vehicle that the passenger must take and will notify them when they must change the line.

The user can view on the map the complete route of a line or just a direction of the route and can save the favorite lines. They will receive a message when a problem occurs with one of them if that problem could affect their trip.

On the page dedicated to lines, they can search for the desired line and then view on the map, in real time, the vehicles on one direction of that line.

They can select a station on the main page or on the route of a line, and thus can see all the lines that stop at that station and what the arrival times are for each line. They can see the next three times and the schedule for all the lines in that station.

Ticket points of the transport administration can be found on the map. By selecting such a point the user can see its operating schedule.

The application is available in Romanian and English, depending on the language set in the device used.

Receive alerts of approaching speed cameras, avoid unnecessary fines and enjoy real-time traffic information with Flitsmeister. The app helps you navigate to your destination and as a cherry on top, you get to start a parking action upon arrival. All of this in a single app and throughout the whole of Europe. Making your life easier, safer and more efficient before, during and after your trip, Flitsmeister is your best friend! 

There are several other ways in which Flitsmeister will make your life easier: 

• Mobile and fixed speed cam, speed check zone alerts; to save your hard-earned cash.   

• Traffic jam alerts; check in advance whether you will be encountering a traffic jam on your route and start a new route if necessary. 

• Service vehicle alerts such as ambulances and fire trucks, to help you get out of the way calmly and in time so they can reach their destination more quickly.  

• Accidents, roadworks, stationary vehicles and other incident alerts: allowing you to anticipate the situation safely and in time. 

• Matrix sign alerts: never miss a closed exit, opened rush hour lane or maximum speed instructions ever again. 

• Navigation: the right instructions to get from A to B, taking into account the current situation on the road or recommending a different route if disturbances are expected on your route.  

• Paid parking: start a parking action upon arrival at your destination with the tap of a button. The app will recognise whether you are located in a parking zone to make sure you don’t forget to start the parking action. We will send you a notification as soon as you get back behind the wheel so you never forget to stop your parking action and never overpay. 

• Traffic lights: certain traffic lights in the Netherlands will send their current status to the app. The number of these ‘smart’ traffic lights will be increasing in the future, allowing us to show you a countdown for the green light and speed recommendations to keep you in the green wave. 

• Apple Carplay for Flitsmeister on the screen of your car: navigate to your destination even more conveniently by displaying Flitsmeister on the screen of your car. Of course, you will also keep receiving the usual alerts for speed cams, traffic jams and hazards during your trip. 


COMMUNITY 
Our entire team is dedicated to making the app better and more complete every single day. We boast a robust community with over 1.7 million active users in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. Flitsmeister’s traffic information is mostly composed by the community; you can submit reports and assess the reports of others. A total of almost 25,000,000 reports is submitted every year.

Got any questions or comments? Send them over to support@flitsmeister.nl. Our supportmeisters are there to assist you. 

COVERAGE
Not all features are available in every country and we are committed to expanding our services. Check out the current coverage in your country here: https://www.flitsmeister.com/en/coverage.html

Coming from V-Traffic?

Welcome to the Flitsmeister community :raised_hands: Together with 1.8 million other drivers we eliminate frustrations in traffic. We are doing all we can to make your transition to Flitsmeister as smooth as possible. If you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact us.

Transurbis Zalău application is a travel portal offered by SC Transurbis SA. In the application all the actions necessary to facilitate the use of public transport can be performed.
The application allows the purchase of travel tickets using the bank card, the calculation of the optimal route for the passenger and the visualization of lines, stations and means of transport in real time on the map.
After creating an account and associating it with a transport card, the user can recharge the card with travel tickets directly in the application, using online payment by bank card. The user can check the status of the card and the active travel tickets at any given time.
A user can manage several transport cards on a single account and can perform actions of recharging the respective cards, whether it is the recharge of the electronic wallet, the purchase of new subscriptions or the extension of the existing ones.
After performing the various purchase/validation/control actions, the user will have the possibility of viewing a detailed history of transactions.
Users who benefit from subsidies in accordance with the legislation in force will be able to request the approval of a subsidized profile directly from the application by sending supporting documents. Following the approval of such a profile from the application or from the ticket point, users will be able to purchase/request, directly from the application, travel tickets with discount or free of charge.
Legal entities that have a collaboration with the transport administration will be able to manage their card portfolio directly from the web portal or the mobile application.
When purchasing a travel ticket, when it is approaching its expiration date or when other actions are performed on the card, the user can choose to receive push notifications or e-mails.
The application provides the traveler with the means to find the optimal route between the starting point A and the arrival point B, using the locations of the vehicles on the route.
The traveler can start the journey from the current location or from another location on the map and can choose their destination by looking for an address, a point of interest, a desired station or even placing a pin on the map. They can also choose a location they have previously searched for or added to favorites.
The application shows how long it will take to get to the nearest station, when the vehicle will arrive at the station and how long the trip will take.
It gives the traveler the possibility of saving frequently used locations on a designated menu page or when searching for those locations on the main page. Thus, the user can start a much faster and easier route in the future.
The application will display in real time the vehicle that the passenger must take and will notify them when they must change the line.
The user can view on the map the complete route of a line or just a direction of the route and can save the favorite lines. They will receive a message when a problem occurs with one of them if that problem could affect their trip.
On the page dedicated to lines, they can search for the desired line and then view on the map, in real time, the vehicles on one direction of that line.
They can select a station on the main page or on the route of a line, and thus can see all the lines that stop at that station and what the arrival times are for each line. They can see the next three times and the schedule for all the lines in that station.
Ticket points of the transport administration can be found on the map. By selecting such a point the user can see its operating schedule.
The application is available in Romanian and English, depending on the language set in the device used.

Simple and Easy App to determine various-format coordinates 

# User-friendly Design #
Your current location will automatically appear as the point of intersection of two grey lines, and can also be manually indicated via value-input, location search, and import from clipboard functions as well. 

# Support of Various Coordinate Formats #
Not only the app specifies Longitude / Latitude, but also supports a number of coordinate formats and systems, i.e., Universal Transverse Mercator Coordinate System (UTM), Military Grid Reference System (MGRS), World Geographic Reference System (Georef), etc. 

# Datum Conversion #
The app is able to transform coordinates within EPSG , ESRI, IAU2000 references from online database, and convert X & Y coordinates, geodetic datums and projected systems.

# Tracking and Navigation #
Pin your desired location on the map to start navigation. Real-time bearing/distance update and large coordinate readout for on-the-field usage are available. 

# World Magnetic Model Calculator #
The app utilizes World Magnetic Model WMM 2015 and/or WMM 2015v2, and is able to compute geomagnetic-field values: i.e., magnetic declinations, intensity, magnetic grid variation, etc. 

# Elevation / Altimeter #
Elevation/altitude data is accessible within landmass area. 

# Import / Export - AirDrop supported #
- Export current coordinates list.
- Import previously-created file to migrate or backup coordinates data between devices.
- .gpx file supported

# Distance measurement #
Distance is measured by pinpointing locations, or drawing lines to create your own route.

# Bearing Calculation #

Has it ever happened that you have to meet someone and the person can't explain where he/she is? This app will quickly find the location of another phone by sending a text message request. Most phones manufactured after 2010 can accept this request, no need to install any additional app on the 2nd person's phone. It does not get any easier than this!

How it is working:

• User A wants to know a User B location.

• User A enters the phone number of User B into the app.

• The app generates a unique URL, and the URL is sent to User B.

• If User B clicks on the link, user A will see the location of user B.

Limitations:

• This is not a spy app. User B must agree to share the location with you.

• If User B has a device without GPS (desktop computer, tablet), the determined location may have a large accuracy margin (up to 5 km).

• In rare situations, when user B is behind the corporate proxy, the app can show the proxy's location, not the user's.

The user location is determined in three ways:

• E.123, E.164
• RIR
• W3C Geolocation API

Comenzile tale online vor fi livrate in mod GRATUIT oricarei masini de taxi licentiate in TIMISOARA sau PLOIESTI.
Legatura ta este directa cu cel mai apropiat taxi disponibil, fara interventia vreunui dispecer. In mod sigur chat-ul cu soferul iti va folosi.
Odata ce ai stabilit corect locatia pe harta, fii sigur ca nici noi, nici masinile noastre nu te vor lasa sa astepti.
Raspunsul la cererea ta este o chestiune de secunde, iar prezentarea la locul corect indicat, o chestiune de minute.
Chiar si daca se va intampla sa nu avem disponibila momentan masina (iar asta se poate intampla la orice firma, mai ales la inceput), noi iti vom da rezultatul in maxim 30 de secunde!
Poti vedea pe harta masina, din momentul alocarii pana la locul de imbarcare si mai departe pe toata durata cursei.
Poti acorda note serviciului prestat si poti merge pana la a exclude definitiv soferul de la viitoarele alocari daca serviciul a fost necorespunzator.
Daca esti in afara orasului, nu mai ai nevoie de telefoane cu explicatii greoaie despre locul unde te afli.
Pur si simplu lasi GPS-ul telefonului sa-ti gaseasca pozitia corecta (sau asezi tu harta in pozitia corecta), si iarasi, in cateva secunde, vei primi raspunsul flotei, impreuna cu timpul estimat de prezentare.
Pentru orice adresa corecta, a doua oara nu va mai fi nevoie de toti acesti pasi, pentru ca o vei avea salvata in lista ta personala, iar asta bineinteles daca nu cumva intre timp te-ai hotarat sa o stergi de acolo.
Oricum noi iti multumim fie doar ca ai citit aceste randuri si iti dorim calatorie placuta, oriunde si cu oricine vei calatori!

This app is primarily intended for all private landowners who want to have on their smartphones or tablets an album of all their land parcels with corresponding maps and other information so they can easily navigate to their land parcels.
The application is also intended for all real estate, precision agriculture and forestry professionals.
Gps Parcela app is based on the idea that all cadastral data (primarily coordinates) of your land parcel are visually available to you personally via the Internet on the geoportal of your country.
However, there is no possibility that any app has a free access to cadastral data of all geoportals in Europe.
Therefore, with a little effort and with our help, you can type into this app the coordinates that you have read on the geoportal. Definitely this is the most precise way to define the boundaries of your land parcel so that you can use all features of this app.
For the purpose of this app, the land parcel is any land having its own boundaries defined by corners. Most often, the land parcel can be a cadastral parcel, but it can also be part of an agricultural plot where you have for example planted apples. The corner points are defined with GPS (WGS84) coordinates known as latitude and longitude.
Also the corner points can be defined in other coordinate reference system provided by your geoportal. You can read the coordinates from the corresponding geoportal map.

App Features:
Identification of land parcels, cadastral parcels.
Display your land parcels on a map on your smartphone.
View the distance between the smartphone and the land parcel.
View your current smartphone location on the map.
Read the current GPS coordinates.
Improved accuracy of the current GPS coordinates reading.
Create a land parcel by entering the coordinates.
Update the entered coordinates.
Download the cadastral parcel coordinates from our web server
Transformation from reference coordinates to Gps (WGS84) coordinates
Calculation of land plot area and boundary line lengths.
Save the land parcel files in your local smartphone storage.
Language support for English, German, Italian, Croatian, Slovenian, Serbian, Czech, Slovak, Polish, Spanish, Portuguese, French.
Support for the coordinate systems and geoportals in the following countries: Austria, Belgium, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, France, Germany, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Poland, Portugal, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Switzerland and Europe.
List of visible satellites
Support for GNSS and L1+L5
Record your current location data (coordinates, speed, time) while you walk or drive. The data is saved in a daily route file.
Display the route on a map.
Create and display the parallel guidance lines used in precision agriculture.

• Up-to-date network of electric car charging stations in Hungary. 
• Find a charger, and start charging.
• Personalised information management.
• Instant access to convenience services: e-vignette, on-street parking, off-street parking.
• Secure, fast payment via OTP SimplePay.

If you have any questions or need further information about our services please do not hesitate to contact us: help@mobiliti.hu
